Text: missing some pages, at least in issue 9, and one of the covers.. recoverable or we need to try and find them from another source?
issue 9 is fine from my end. it must've gone back somewhere along the way. send a message to bopgun23@gmail.com and i'll send whoever any corrupted issues via email.
Issue #29 doesn't load. Issue #32 (LAST issue) is missing. Some minor errors - otherwise a brilliant comic - thanks bopgun.
